channel.title: Runserver errors
channel.description:
I keep either getting
[code]Starting fr33sc4p3 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:2957 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at server.run(server.java:151) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
or once i restart i get this
[code]Starting fr33sc4p3 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3006 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3007 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3008 Client type: high memory version UserId: 80152102 someone is signing onto server. LOADED: 0 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3013 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3014 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3015 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3016 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3021 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3022 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3023 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3028 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3029 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3030[/code]
